Container.Name: qbittorrent

Branch.TagDescription: Static qbittorrent builds using libtorrent v1

Container.Overview: The Qbittorrent(https://www.qbittorrent.org/) project aims to provide an open-source software alternative to ÂµTorrent. qBittorrent is based on the Qt toolkit and libtorrent-rasterbar library.
Container.Changes:
### 2023-10-07 - Install unrar from linuxserver repo(https://github.com/linuxserver/docker-unrar).
### 2023-08-10 - Bump unrar to 6.2.10.
### 2023-06-17 - Deprecate armhf as per https://www.linuxserver.io/armhf(https://www.linuxserver.io/armhf).
### 2023-06-10 - Bump unrar to 6.2.8.
### 2023-02-23 - Add qt6-qtbase-sqlite to support SQLite database for resume files.
### 2022-11-29 - Add openssl1.1-compat for qbittorrent-cli.
### 2022-10-31 - Add libtorrentv1 branch.
### 2022-08-31 - Rebase to Alpine Edge again to follow latest releases.
### 2022-08-12 - Bump unrar to 6.1.7.
### 2022-06-16 - Rebase to Alpine 3.16 from edge.
### 2022-05-25 - Fetch qbitorrent-cli from upstream repo.
### 2022-03-02 - Add unrar, 7zip, and qbitorrent-cli.
### 2022-03-01 - Add python for search plugin support.
### 2022-02-23 - Rebase to Alpine Edge, install from Alpine repos.
### 2022-02-19 - Add jq to build-stage
### 2022-01-07 - Rebase to Alpine, build from source.
### 2022-01-06 - Deprecate unstable branch.
### 2021-02-10 - Rebase to focal.
### 2021-01-20 - Deprecate `UMASK_SET` in favor of UMASK in baseimage, see above for more information.
### 2020-11-12 - Stop creating /config/data directory on startup
### 2020-04-03 - Fix adding search engine plugin
### 2019-08-02 - Add qbitorrent-cli for processing scripts.
### 2019-03-23 - Switching to new Base images, shift to arm32v7 tag.
### 2019-01-14 - Rebase to Ubuntu, add multi arch and pipeline logic.
### 2018-09-25 - Use buildstage type build, bump qbitorrent to 4.1.3.
### 2018-08-14 - Rebase to alpine 3.8, bump libtorrent to 1.1.9 and qbitorrent to 4.1.2.
### 2018-06-08 - Bump qbitorrent to 4.1.1.
### 2018-04-26 - Bump libtorrent to 1.1.7.
### 2018-03-02 - Bump qbitorrent to 4.0.4 and libtorrent to 1.1.6.
### 2018-01-02 - Deprecate cpu_core routine lack of scaling.
### 2017-12-19 - Update to v4.0.3.
### 2017-02-09 - Rebase to alpine 3.7
### 2017-12-01 - Update to v4.0.2.
### 2017-11-27 - Update to v4 and use cpu_core routine to speed up builds.
### 2017-09-16 - Bump to 3.3.16, Add WEBUI_PORT variable and notes to README to allow changing port of webui.
### 2017-08-01 - Initial Release.
### 2018-02-12 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: WEBUI_PORT
Config.Description: for changing the port of the webui, see below for explanation
